The new law must give the right to vote for the age of 18 years, and to give women their rights and to participate in parliamentary councils #lebanon #elections #presidency
We have been holding elections for sixty years and others have not had elections and today we disagree with the aim of canceling the elections. #presidency #lebanon #elections
I will not accept to put on my covenant a sectarian election law and we have dreams and there have been difficult events but we will not go back and the days ahead will see a development #lebanon
The Lebanese army is the symbol of the unity of the homeland and has been able to maintain its unity in the most difficult times, it must be strengthened #lebanon #lebarmy #presidency

Any Lebanese president does not accept that any state will impose its opinion on the election law. This is clear. The Taif must be protected by a modern election law that reflects the representation of the factions

There are many projects that must be implemented, and we are late in doing so. Of electricity and water dams. #lebanon #presidency
The policy aims to develop and develop a decent life for citizens, and to develop the country and not vice versa, that we use the development to work in politics #lebanon #presidency
The Lebanese have contributed to building the countries they emigrated to, so you have fulfilled your duties towards the Lebanese state and you have a right to do their duty towards you. #lebanon
